value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending

value.title: Pushing the Power BI buttons 👆
value.excerpt: You haven't missed the Power Bi April 2018 update right?  My favourite feature is by far the new buttons! With Power Bi buttons you can create all kinds of experiences, like buttons to change charts, as I show in this demo.  What is your favourite Power BI april 2018 update? Let me know in the comment

value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.
